posts.message:
الحلقة التانية من ADTV في الحلقة دي بنتكلم عن الDebugging بشكل عام و بنتطرق لموضوع تحليل الCrash Dumps باستخدام WinDbg. 
في انتظار تعليقاتكم و أسئلتكم.
posts.description: Debugging applications using WinDbg and analyzing crash dumps. To download debugging tools for windows, follow instructions found here http://msdn.microsoft....

Innovix Solutions in Hurghada, Red Sea is Hiring, we are looking for Junior and Senior ASP.Net web develoeprs, please check job description here:

http://innovixsolutions.com/jobs/web-developer.pdf

To apply, please send your CV to: hr@innovixsolutions.com

posts.description:
What is the best investment for developers?
1- Good Chair
2- Good Bed
3- Good Computer

You spend almost 70% of your life using these things, so invest in making them great.
